sentence: Proposed NC congressional map could put Madison Cawthorn's seat insignificant electoral danger: report Raw Story, Matthew Chapman, 2/14/2022 On Monday, writing for Carolina Journal, former North Carolina GOP Executive Director Dallas Woodhouse outlined how a proposed state congressional map to remediate the illegal gerrymander struck down by state courts could affect one district in particular: that of freshman GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn.
title: North Carolina Open Thread

sentence: ICYMI Cawthorn's bad news cycle: Some watchdog groups raised concerns that North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn may have violated insider trading laws when he hyped the Let's Go Brandon? cryptocurrency on Instagram the day before it announced a sponsorship deal with the NASCAR driver Brandon Brown and its value spiked.
